text: lqd sadaq allah rasulah mhmdana rwyah alty 'araha 'iiaah bialhaqi 'anah yadkhul hu washabh bayt allah alharam amnyn, la takhafun 'ahl alshrk, mhlliqyn rwwskm wmqssiryn, faealim allah min alkhayr walmslh (fy sarafakum ean "mk" eamkm dhlk wdkhwlkm 'iilayha fima bed) ma lam taelamuu antm, fajaeal min dun dkhwlkm "mk" aldhy wedtm bh, fthana qrybana, wahu hudna "alhdyby" wafath "khybr
